casebody.data:
Ryan, Appellant, v. Wright et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Ryan v. Wright, 119 Ohio St.3d 34, 2008-Ohio-3512.]

(No. 2007-0708 Submitted June 4, 2008 Decided July 17, 2008.) Robert Gray Palmer Co., L.P.A., and Robert G. Palmer, for appellant. John C. Nemeth & Associates and David A. Herd, for appellees.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Shoemaker v. Gindlesberger, 118 Ohio St.3d 226, 2008-Ohio-2012, 887 N.E.2d 1167.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
